weakness.name: Undetected changes in Virtual Machine configurations
weakness.desc: The changes in virtual machines configurations are not detected because the monitorization and alerts of the security configuration are not configured.

test.steps:
1. In the Azure portal, click Resource Groups, select myResourceGroup, and then select myVM in the resource list.
  2. Click Alert rules on the VM blade.
  3. Check there are some metric alerts and they are correctly configured and enabled.
